attributes.action: Open safe, legal routes to the UK for people fleeing war in Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: This is to save lives of Ukrainians caught in a war of aggression by the Russian state.
attributes.background: End the effective suspension of visa applications from Ukraine, urgently create a resettlement program in the U.K. and facilitate Ukrainians applying for asylum from third countries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
